story.title: About AIERXUAN
story.subtitle: Professional Laptop Manufacturer Since 2014
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2014, AIERXUAN specializes in high-performance laptops and mini PCs for B2B clients worldwide. As an Intel China Channel Partner since 2019, we've shipped 500,000+ units to customers in 50+ countries.
story.paragraph2: Our 15,000„é° facility combines advanced manufacturing with strict quality control. We offer flexible MOQ from 1 sample to bulk orders, full OEM/ODM customization, and fast 7-15 day delivery.

meta.title: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions | AIERXUAN
meta.description: Find answers to common questions about AIERXUAN's OEM/ODM laptop manufacturing services, MOQ, lead times, payment terms, and quality control.
meta.keywords: laptop manufacturer FAQ, OEM FAQ, ODM questions, custom laptop order, wholesale laptop

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our OEM/ODM manufacturing services

items.question: How long has AIERXUAN been in business?
items.answer: AIERXUAN was established in 2014, giving us over 10 years of experience in laptop and mini PC manufacturing. We have shipped more than 500,000 units to customers in 50+ countries worldwide.

items.question: What certifications do your products have?
items.answer: Our products are certified with CE (European), FCC (US), RoHS, and UL certifications. Our manufacturing facility is ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 certified, ensuring quality management and environmental compliance.

items.question: Are you an Intel authorized partner?
items.answer: Yes, we have been an Intel China Channel Partner since 2019. This partnership ensures we have access to the latest Intel processors and technology support for our products.

items.question: Can I visit your factory?
items.answer: Absolutely! We welcome factory visits from potential partners. Our 15,000„é° facility in Shenzhen includes production lines, testing labs, and R&D center. Please contact us to arrange a visit.

items.question: What products can you manufacture?
items.answer: We manufacture business laptops (14-15.6 inch), gaming laptops (15.6-17.3 inch), mini PCs, 2-in-1 convertibles, and rugged industrial devices. We can customize specifications including CPU, RAM, storage, display, and more.

items.question: What's the difference between OEM and ODM?
items.answer: OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturing) means we manufacture products based on your designs. ODM (Original Design Manufacturing) means we provide ready-to-market designs that you can customize and rebrand. Both options allow full branding customization.

items.question: Can you pre-install our software?
items.answer: Yes, we offer complete software customization including OS installation (Windows/Linux), driver optimization, and pre-installation of your proprietary software. We also support custom BIOS logos and boot screens.

items.question: What customization options are available?
items.answer: We offer full customization including: custom logo printing/engraving, packaging design, color options, hardware configurations, software pre-installation, keyboard layouts, and more. Our team will work with you to meet your exact specifications.

items.question: What quality control processes do you have?
items.answer: We implement a rigorous 7-step quality control process: incoming material inspection, component assembly check, power-on testing, 72-hour burn-in test, final quality inspection, packaging quality check, and pre-shipment verification.

items.question: What is burn-in testing?
items.answer: Burn-in testing runs each device continuously for 72 hours under stress conditions to identify any potential hardware failures before shipping. This ensures reliability and reduces DOA (Dead on Arrival) rates.

items.question: What's your defect rate?
items.answer: Our defect rate is less than 0.5%, significantly below the industry average. This is achieved through strict component sourcing, comprehensive testing, and continuous quality improvement processes.

items.question: Do you provide warranty?
items.answer: Yes, we provide a standard 1-year warranty for all products. Extended warranty options are available. We also offer RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) support and spare parts supply for after-sales service.

items.question: What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ)?
items.answer: Our standard MOQ is 300 units for OEM orders and 500 units for ODM orders. For sample orders, we can provide 1-10 units for testing and evaluation before placing bulk orders.

items.question: What are the lead times?
items.answer: Lead times depend on order size: Samples take 7-15 days, standard orders (under 1000 units) take 15-25 days, and large orders (1000+ units) take 25-45 days. Rush orders can be accommodated with advance notice.

items.question: What payment terms do you accept?
items.answer: We accept T/T (bank transfer), L/C (Letter of Credit), and PayPal. Standard terms are 30% deposit upon order confirmation and 70% balance before shipment. Flexible payment terms available for established partners.

items.question: Do you ship worldwide?
items.answer: Yes, we ship to 50+ countries worldwide. We support various shipping methods including sea freight, air freight, and express delivery (DHL, FedEx, UPS). Door-to-door delivery available for most destinations.

items.question: Can you handle customs and import documentation?
items.answer: We provide all necessary export documentation including commercial invoice, packing list, certificate of origin, and product certifications. We can also assist with customs clearance procedures and import requirements.

items.question: How do I start working with AIERXUAN?
items.answer: Simply contact us through our website or email with your requirements. Our sales team will arrange a consultation call to understand your needs, provide recommendations, and send you a detailed quotation within 24 hours.

items.question: Do you offer exclusive distribution agreements?
items.answer: Yes, we can arrange exclusive distribution agreements for specific regions or product lines. This includes guaranteed pricing, priority production scheduling, and dedicated support. Contact us to discuss partnership opportunities.

items.question: What after-sales support do you provide?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive after-sales support including technical assistance, warranty service, RMA processing, spare parts supply, and firmware/driver updates. Our support team is available via email, phone, and WhatsApp.

items.question: Can you provide product training?
items.answer: Yes, we offer product training for your sales and technical teams. This includes product specifications, feature demonstrations, troubleshooting guides, and competitive positioning. Training can be conducted online or at our facility.

contact.title: Still Have Questions?
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to help you with any additional inquiries
